message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $12000 to you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10500 is just a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11000? This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11000. How about we try $10750? I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to stay within my budget.
